description: Returns a list of a specified insight's recommendations. Each recommendation includes a list of related metrics and a list of related events.

parameters.name: InsightId
parameters.description: The ID of the requested insight.

nested_items.name: Recommendations
nested_items.description: An array of the requested recommendations.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the problem.

nested_items.name: Link
nested_items.description: A hyperlink to information to help you address the problem.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the recommendation.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The reason DevOps Guru flagged the anomalous behavior as a problem.

nested_items.name: RelatedEvents
nested_items.description: Events that are related to the problem. Use these events to learn more about what's happening and to help address the issue.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the event. This corresponds to the Name field in an Event object.

nested_items.name: Resources
nested_items.description: A ResourceCollection object that contains arrays of the names of Amazon Web Services CloudFormation stacks. You can specify up to 500 Amazon Web Services CloudFormation stacks.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource that emitted the event. This corresponds to the Name field in an EventResource object.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the resource that emitted the event. This corresponds to the Type field in an EventResource object.

nested_items.name: RelatedAnomalies
nested_items.description: Anomalies that are related to the problem. Use these Anomalies to learn more about what's happening and to help address the issue.

nested_items.name: Resources
nested_items.description: An array of objects that represent resources in which DevOps Guru detected anomalous behavior. Each object contains the name and type of the resource.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the resource. Resource types take the same form that is used by Amazon Web Services CloudFormation resource type identifiers, service-provider::service-name::data-type-name. For example, AWS::RDS::DBCluster. For more information, see Amazon Web Services resource and property types reference in the Amazon Web Services CloudFormation User Guide.

nested_items.name: SourceDetails
nested_items.description: Information about where the anomalous behavior related the recommendation was found. For example, details in Amazon CloudWatch metrics.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchMetrics
nested_items.description: An array of CloudWatchMetricsDetail objects that contains information about the analyzed metrics that displayed anomalous behavior.

nested_items.name: MetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch metric.

nested_items.name: Namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the CloudWatch metric. A namespace is a container for CloudWatch metrics.

nested_items.name: AnomalyId
nested_items.description: The ID of an anomaly that generated the insight with this recommendation.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category type of the recommendation.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to retrieve the next page of results for this operation. If there are no more pages, this value is null.
